        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            Lists templates to back up. Use '*' to back up all templates.
          
          
            
            Lists cache templates to back up. Use '*' to back up all templates.

-*--cache-configs*='config1,config2,...'::
-Lists cache configurations to back up. Use '*' to back up all cache configurations.
+*--templates*='config1,config2,...'::
+Lists templates to back up. Use '*' to back up all templates.

This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters


  


    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            |Specifies either an array of templates to back up or `*` for all templates.
          
          
            
            |Specifies either an array of cache templates to back up or `*` for all templates.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -8,7 +8,7 @@
 
 |`cache-configs`
 |OPTIONAL
-|Specifies either an array of cache configurations to back up or `*` for all cache configurations.
+|Specifies either an array of templates to back up or `*` for all templates.

@@ -18,8 +18,8 @@
 |OPTIONAL
 |Defines either an array of Protobuf schema names to back up or `*` for all schemas.
 
-|`scripts`
+|`tasks`
 |OPTIONAL

+|Specifies either an array of script names to back up or `*` for all tasks.
